title: didnt get mastery token and masteries are all bugged up
body:
so i played a game as m5 galio got an s- and didn't get a token.

after this patch masteries are all fucked up so i advise you to keep a record (screenshot) if you get an s-,s or s+ and dont get a m6/m7 token.

shit needs to be hotfixed

replies.body:
Dw this wont affect me...

14/3/10 253cs S-

12/5/12 352cs S-

17/6/8 224cs A+

The list goes on
_(genunlely this my my whole match history.)_

He's been one of the top champs in my roster since I started league _(way back when he was a skeleton)_, but apparently the universe doesn't want me to be lvl 7 Karthus....

But yea, nah they need to fix this.
I got one m6 token because i played him randomly in a norms game and got fed asf

Yea I got lvl 6 instantly when lvl 6/7 came out, but I haven't played him much, and now I'm slogging to get lvl 7 all i can get is S- xD

It's annoying because the system punishes you so hard for dying, yet thats the whole point of Karthus xD

>yet thats the whole point of Karthus xD

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/51/0d/1c/510d1cc3fffdf45258807875cdb0ebd0.png

It entirely possible that Mastery is being recorded and just not visually displayed. If you hover over your icon in the top right (above the friends list) you will see your mastery score still intact and functioning up there. It'll all be fixed soon enough and rewards will be redeemed I imagine.
Oh I just looked and have no masteries at all, total mastery score zero.. I hope they can restore it.
